effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
